headline.main: B-17 HOTSHOTS' HIT 3 SHIPS AT RABAUL; 10,000-Ton Transport Is Set Afire -- Raiders Are Unhurt

lead_paragraph: AT A NEW GUINEA BASE, Dec. 31 (AP) -- Major Ed Scott and his "B-17 Hotshots" have been at it again.
abstract: 'B-17 Hotshots,' US bomber squadron led by Maj E Scott, hit 3 Jap ships, Rabaul
snippet: AT A NEW GUINEA BASE, Dec. 31 (AP) -- Major Ed Scott and his "B-17 Hotshots" have been at it again....
